name: SMOLDER
description:
You are a Fire Elemental. You must burn plants to survive and grow. Tiles with plants on them will grow more plants. Tiles without plants will never grow anything. Be careful not to kill tiles.

  • Left Click to Move
  • Any key to pause
  • Tiles with plants on them heal you
  • You quickly destroy tiles
  • Tiles grow back
  • Sand Tiles will never grow back
  • Water hurts

Forest Fire Sound Effect Credit:  Partners in Rhythm

All other assets were created by me during the period of Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2018

Achievements Met:

  • Maverick
  • One Punch Man

I wanted to use as minimal a UI as I could. Spent a lot of time trying to convey your HP through things like, light intensity, sound pitch, shadow strength, etc....
